ABU DHABI ( Reuters ) - United Arab Emirates - based supermarket chain Lulu Group said on Monday it plans to invest $ 200 million on halal - only outlets in Malaysia in the next two years ahead of expanding into other south Asian markets .

Owned by Yusuff Ali M.A , who was ranked first on the Forbes list of the richest 100 Indians in the Arab world last year , Lulu has 110 supermarkets and hypermarkets across the Gulf , Yemen , Egypt and India .
